title: Living in & belonging to a place
other_title: Living in and belonging to a place
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/People with disabilities
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Brain damage - Patients - Rehabilitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Brain damage
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Community - Moral and ethical aspects
abstract: 'How do you live when the person you thought you are is gone.'
description: Barbara Pater provides some insight into what it is like to have an acquired brain injury. Some people want to retreat from the world and some join their local community group but all struggle to restore a sense of dignity.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006941; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (Nov/Dec 2005); Active; 2005
